org.springframework.cache

接口 CacheManager

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractCacheManager, AbstractTransactionSupportingCacheManager, CaffeineCacheManager, CompositeCacheManager, ConcurrentMapCacheManager, EhCacheCacheManager, JCacheCacheManager, NoOpCacheManager, RedisCacheManager, SimpleCacheManager, TransactionAwareCacheManagerProxy

    public interface CacheManager
    Spring's central cache manager SPI. Allows for retrieving named Cache regions.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.1

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Cache getCache(String name)
      Return the cache associated with the given name.
      Collection<String> getCacheNames()
      Return a collection of the cache names known by this manager.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCache

        @Nullable
Cache getCache(String name)
        Return the cache associated with the given name.
        参数:
        name - the cache identifier (must not be null)
        返回:
        the associated cache, or null if none found

      • getCacheNames

        Collection<String> getCacheNames()
        Return a collection of the cache names known by this manager.
        返回:
        the names of all caches known by the cache manager
